info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:57AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Haakon, southeastern Meade, northeastern Jackson and east central Pennington Counties through 445 AM MDT... At 356 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Creighton to 8 miles west of Kadoka. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Philip, Elm Springs, Grindstone, Creighton, Cottonwood, Nowlin and Grindstone Butte. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 139 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
